thread.title: Krauthammer: Immigration win 'a problem' for Republicans
thread.title_full: Krauthammer: Immigration win 'a problem' for Republicans | Fox News

author: FoxNews.com
title: Krauthammer: Immigration win 'a problem' for Republicans
text:
Published May 26, 2015 FoxNews.com livefyre Email Print
Charles Krauthammer said Tuesday on “Special Report with Bret Baier” that the federal appeals court ruling that refused to lift a temporary hold on the president's executive actions on immigration is "a problem" for Republicans.
“For the Republicans, you know, it's a problem,” the syndicated columnist and Fox News contributor said. “It's like the case going forward on Obamacare and the thing about the exchanges and the subsidies.”
Krauthammer added that “if somehow this would be completely tossed out, then the question will be, 'well, what's your plan on immigration reform, if anything?' I think, up until now you can say, 'well, it's in the hands of the courts, but at a certain point it's not going to be and you're going to have to answer."
 Bill Clinton used personal 'LLC' as 'pass-through' for payments, sources say 2 Appeals court refuses to lift hold on Obama immigration action 3 Bill Cilnton puts blame for family's scandals on accountant 4 Bulletin warns US analysts overwhelmed by pro-ISIS social media, military posts threatened 5 ObamaCare fallout: Could the GOP be hardest hit in 2016 election?
